Reference

All functions

addConfiguration()

Add configuration

addEdges()

Add selected edges.

addLasso()

Add lass interaction to the widget.

addNodes()

Add nodes.

center()

Center the network

getDefaultJsonConfig()

Creates a default JSON configuration

grapher()

Grapher

groupSingletons()

Group singletons.

hex2rgba()

hex2rgba Converts Hexadecimal colors (with or w/o transparency) to rgba/rgb strings.

logNetwork()

Logs the network to the rendering console. Useful for debugging.

%>%

Chain API calls with an htmlwidget.

removeEdges()

Remove selected edges.

removeNodes()

#' Generates the JSON configuration of a given grapher object. #' @param id Either the grapher's htmlwidget instance or, if in a shiny context, the container id the widget is housed in. #' @export get_json_config <- function(id) # if (!is(g, "grapher")) stop("'get_json_config' expects a grapher object.") export <- list(id = id, method = "getGraph") callJS() Remove selected nodes.

splitByLabel()

Splits nodes by a given labeling

toggleLasso()

Disables lass interaction to the widget.

updateEdgeColor()

Update the edge colors.

updateNetwork()

Update the network.

updateNodeColor()

Update the node colors.

updateNodeSize()

Update the node sizes.

updateNodes()

Update specific nodes.
